name: Catch Me! (derinozon, revolando)
description:
Catch Me! is a game inspired by the cat fights :) But as we all know, before the fight there will be a lot of chase! 

THE GOAL

Catch the A.I. cat which runs away from players. Catch the cat ASAP to get the highest point.

( Each game begins with a new random environment, so don't get used to it. )

GAMEPLAY

Run and jump over the windowsills and roof tops.

Also the ground can be used for running and jumping but be aware of trees and bushes. They will slow you down!

CONTROLS

LEFT
A + arrow keys

RIGHT
D + arrow keys

JUMP
W + SPACE + Up Arrow

DOWN
S + Down Arrow

TEAM:
- - - Code Master - - -
Derin Ozon

- - - Art & Sound Master - - -
Aydın Ozon
